China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 5 日星期一 09:08:20 GMT 120
Exclusive: AI chip demand forces Huawei to slow smartphone production -sourcesSoaring appetite for Huawei's (HWT.UL) artificial intelligence (AI) chips coupled with manufacturing constraints has forced the Chinese tech giant to prioritise AI and slow production for its premium Mate 60 phones, people familiar with the matter said. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:56:10 GMT ESESJTBBJBP7VJGHQMDZFGQR54 https://www.reuters.com/technology/ai-chip-demand-forces-huawei-slow-smartphone-product-sources-2024-02-05/Fanny Potkin, Julie Zhu技术
What is China's suspended death sentence verdict?Australian writer and pro-democracy blogger Yang Hengjun was handed a suspended death sentence by a Beijing court on Monday, in what human rights advocates say is an unusually harsh verdict in an espionage-related case. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:49:09 GMT INXOWDK3ARKNTCKF4LGNTSH5B4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/what-is-chinas-suspended-death-sentence-verdict-2024-02-05/Laurie Chen世界亚太地区
Taiwan reports nine Chinese military aircraft crossing strait's median lineTaiwan's defence ministry said on Monday it had detected nine Chinese military aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:23:34 GMT UR3G2VE7JFLYNLYKZGMARPHSOE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-nine-chinese-military-aircraft-crossing-straits-median-line-2024-02-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
Why China's national team won't save spiralling marketsFor a second day running state-backed buying likely scraped Chinese stocks from multi-year lows. Investors doubt the support will last and warn it leaves markets unbalanced and unstable. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:21:14 GMT 32QOZ5XDYZNTBAK3K3EJAQMPGM https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/why-chinas-national-team-wont-save-spiralling-markets-2024-02-05/Tom Westbrook, Summer Zhen市场宏观问题
Philippines wards off cyber attacks from China-based hackersHackers operating in China attempted to break into websites and e-mail systems of the Philippine's president and government agencies, one promoting maritime security, but failed, an information and communications ministry official said on Monday. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 07:36:34 GMT I53XJDV7RVL73GFUJ7IEP5C7PM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-wards-off-cyber-attacks-china-based-hackers-2024-02-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
German exports fall more than expected in DecemberGerman exports fell more than expected in December due to weak global demand, data from the federal statistics office showed on Monday. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 07:19:40 GMT QFZXEWLHVJLNFDLXWLXSAVGIWM https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/german-exports-fall-more-than-expected-december-2024-02-05/Maria Martinez市场宏观问题
